label: Inertial = Gravitational mass
reason: Equivalence principle is foundational physics, not PM-specific
note: FOUNDATIONAL: Inertial = Gravitational mass. This is a framework assumption, not an empirical prediction.
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144

# Equivalence principle: m_inertial = m_gravitational
# In PM: both masses emerge from same geometric projection cost
# Inertia = resistance to acceleration in V7 manifold
# Gravity = coupling to bulk curvature
m_inertial_source = chi / roots      # Same projection
m_gravitational_source = chi / roots # Same geometric origin

# FOUNDATIONAL: Verified by construction in PM framework
verified = m_inertial_source == m_gravitational_source
